title: Genesis Chapter 35 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 35 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did Jacob do in Genesis 35:9?
options: Built an altar to the Lord
questions.explanation: Genesis 35:9 states: "And God appeared unto Jacob again, when he came out of Padanaram, and blessed him."

questions.question: According to Genesis 35:1, who said unto Jacob?

questions.question: According to Genesis 35:20, who set a pillar upon her grave?
questions.explanation: Genesis 35:20 states: "And Jacob set a pillar upon her grave: that is the pillar of Rachel's grave unto this day."

questions.question: Where was Jacob according to Genesis 35:6?
questions.explanation: Genesis 35:6 states: "So Jacob came to Luz, which is in the land of Canaan, that is, Bethel, he and all the people that were with him."

questions.question: In Genesis 35:8, Leah called Allonbachuth.
questions.explanation: This is false. It was Rebekah, not Leah, who called Allonbachuth. Genesis 35:8 states: "But Deborah Rebekah's nurse died, and she was buried beneath Bethel under an oak: and the name of..."

questions.question: In Genesis 35:15, Leah called His people.
questions.explanation: This is false. It was Jacob, not Leah, who called His people. Genesis 35:15 states: "And Jacob called the name of the place where God spake with him, Bethel."

questions.question: In Genesis 35:22, Deborah came to pass.
questions.explanation: This is false. It was Israel, not Deborah, who came to pass. Genesis 35:22 states: "And it came to pass, when Israel dwelt in that land, that Reuben went and lay with Bilhah his fat..."
